text: Graham Edwards (born 21 July 1936) is an English former professional footballer. He played in the Netherlands for VVV-Venlo. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:English footballers Category:VVV-Venlo players Category:Eerste Divisie players Category:Eredivisie players Category:English expatriate footballers Category:English expatriate sportspeople in the Netherlands Category:Expatriate footballers in the Netherlands Category:Association footballers not categorized by position
title: Graham Edwards (footballer)
